title: PHPhttp_response_code()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPhttp_response_code()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Set the HTTP response status code to 404:
<?php
http_response_code(404);
?>
Definition and Usage
The http_response_code() function sets or returns the HTTP response status code.
Syntax
http_response_code(
code
)
Parameter Values
Parameter
Description
code
Optional. Specifies a response code (like 404)
Technical Details
Return Value:
If
code
is set, the 
 returned. If
code
is not set, the current status code is returned
PHP Version:
5.4+

★
+1
